```{r setup}
library(skyscraper)
library(chariot)
```

# First Time Setup      

A `cancergov` Postgres schema is made to the database with the addition of a CONCEPT_LOG, CONCEPT_METADATA, and CONCEPT_DEFINITION Tables.      

```{r}
conn <- chariot::connectAthena()
skyscraper::createCancerGovSchema(conn = conn)
skyscraper::ddlCancerGovSchema(conn = conn)
chariot::dcAthena(conn=conn)
```
